 WPIBinaryImage WPIGrayscaleImage.getThreshold(int threshold)
          Returns a black and white image where every pixel that is higher (in the 0-255 scale) than the given threshold is white, and everything below is black.

          Returns a black and white image where every pixel that is higher (in the 0-255 scale) than the given threshold is black, and everything below is white.
